prev.title: Five Books
prev.summary: 之前看到群友分享Paul graham 关于好书很少的argument，联想到这个网站，推荐每个领域的5本最好的书

next.title: Tuomas Salo
next.summary: Not everything was perfect in 1995, but I think we've lost something on the way. Some remarks: 1) Underlined letters indicate keyboard shortcuts. How handy! 2) Design clearly says: "We are buttons!". It's easy to find the wanted button, because they have some color. 1/3
